Articles.Content:
Hi! Im PowderMonk from Italy

 

I play KSP from alpha and always had it installed on my (various) PC.

Never been really good at it, but damn when you land your thing on planets is always a good feel.

what to say, ksp is just the best game ever hahaha, it's simple but challenging if you want. Nothing best to chill with.

Hey, @PowderMonk !

I am glad to welcome you on forums! I hope you'll enjoy your stay here and conquer more planets!

Welcome! Sometimes when I play KSP I like to just sit and watch some probe orbit a planet, it's very nice. There's a lot of variety in what you can do with this game, including building Rubik's cubes!
